about_the_game:
TITRIS affection is a thrilling block puzzle game where strategy meets temptation! Match colorful blocks to form squares, sync with the scanline’s changing color, and score big. Keep your companion happy through skillful play, and they’ll reward you with more than just points—if you can stay focused!

Gameplay

Dive into a unique and challenging block puzzle experience! In TITRIS affection, colorful shapes fall from above and break apart into individual blocks upon landing. Match blocks by color to form squares, and a scanline will sweep them away for points. But there’s a twist— the scanline changes its clearing color! Strategize carefully to align your matches with the scanline cycle for maximum points and to avoid gridlock.

Companions

Choose from a cast of companions, each bringing unique twists to the gameplay. One companion might introduce dual-colored shapes for tactical flexibility, while another adds a third color for heightened difficulty. Master their quirks to climb the leaderboard!

And for an added layer of motivation: keep your companion happy through skillful play, and they’ll reward you with a bit more than just a smile. Piece by piece, they’ll shed their attire, culminating in a fully revealing reward for your focus and precision. Just don’t let the distraction derail your strategy!
